md:
giải nghĩa từ "after" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. After (preposition):
	* Meaning: sau, sau khi, sau đó
	* Example: I'll meet you at the park after lunch.
	* Related words: before, during, meanwhile

2. After (conjunction):
	* Meaning: sau khi, sau đó
	* Example: I'll go to the movies after I finish my homework.
	* Related words: before, since, as soon as

3. After (verb):
	* Meaning: theo đuổi, theo sau
	* Example: The police are after the suspect.
	* Related words: follow, pursue, chase

4. After (adverb):
	* Meaning: sau đó, sau khi
	* Example: I'll see you after.
	* Related words: later, afterwards, subsequently

5. After (noun):
	* Meaning: sau, hậu quả
	* Example: The after of the party was a mess.
	* Related words: consequence, result, aftermath
html:
giải nghĩa từ "after" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. After (preposition):

    • Meaning: sau, sau khi, sau đó
    • Example: I'll meet you at the park after lunch.
    • Related words: before, during, meanwhile

  2. After (conjunction):

    • Meaning: sau khi, sau đó
    • Example: I'll go to the movies after I finish my homework.
    • Related words: before, since, as soon as

  3. After (verb):

    • Meaning: theo đuổi, theo sau
    • Example: The police are after the suspect.
    • Related words: follow, pursue, chase

  4. After (adverb):

    • Meaning: sau đó, sau khi
    • Example: I'll see you after.
    • Related words: later, afterwards, subsequently

  5. After (noun):

    • Meaning: sau, hậu quả
    • Example: The after of the party was a mess.
    • Related words: consequence, result, aftermath
